column1: Explain the basic architecture of a neural network (e.g., input layer, hidden layers, output layer).
Discuss the concept of backpropagation in training neural networks.
What are some common applications of deep learning (e.g., computer vision, natural language processing)?
Describe different types of neural network architectures (e.g., Convolutional Neural Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks).
Discuss challenges associated with training deep learning models (e.g., vanishing gradients, overfitting).
Explain how you would pre-process text data for natural language processing tasks.
Describe common techniques for sentiment analysis in text data.
Briefly explain the concept of word embeddings and their applications.
Discuss the importance of data augmentation techniques in deep learning.
How do you handle ethical considerations surrounding bias in machine learning models, especially NLP models?
